attributes.action: Have a uniform national minimum wage for those aged 18+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that those aged below 22 should be penalised with regard to pay on grounds of their age, when there are laws to protect against age discrimination (which includes salary) in the workplace.  Current minimum wage laws discriminate against adults who are 18-21

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
